mods:titleInfo.mods:title: United Nations Under-Secretary Bunche comes to Gaza

mods:mods.mods:note: "UN 53656 -- Gaza, 11 March 1957 -- U.N. Under-Secretary Ralph Bunche today came to Gaza for a 24-hour visit. He is shown here stepping off his plane, after arriving by air from Abu Suweir, the base camp of the U.N. Emergency Force (UNEF) in Egypt. He was accompanied by Maj. Gen. E.L.M. Burns, Commander of UNEF. Dr. Bunche will visit some of the units in the Gaza area; he will also confer with staff officers of the Force and officials of the U.N. Relief & Works Agency for Palestine Refugees (UNRWA)."

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Ralph J. Bunche visits Cyprus

mods:mods.mods:note: Ralph Bunche, U.N. Under-Secretary for Special Political Affairs, visited Nicosia, Cyprus in the course of routine visits to Gaza and Kashmir to study the problems and needs of the United Nations truce supervision and peace force operations in these areas. In this photograph, Bunche meets Turkish Cypriots in the refugee camp at Hamitkoy, near Nicosia

He is shown here stepping off his plane, after arriving by air from Abu Suweir, the base camp of the U.N. Emergency Force (UNEF) in Egypt. He was accompanied by Maj. Gen. E.L.M. Burns, Commander of UNEF. Dr. Bunche will visit some of the units in the Gaza area; he will also confer with staff officers of the Force and officials of the U.N.
